snippet: With “Story/Time #35,” at New York Live Arts, Bill T. Jones began two weeks of reading one-minute tales as his dancers perform snippets from his company’s repertory.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance performance in which choreographer Bill T Jones contributes readings from his own one-minute stories at New York Live Arts.
lead_paragraph: With “Story/Time #35,” at New York Live Arts, Bill T. Jones began two weeks of reading one-minute tales as his dancers perform snippets from his company’s repertory.
